Detailed Description

Validator: Content-Type - gets the content-type header and compares with the given value.

ValidatorContentType.run ( Response $  oResponse  ) 

Run the validator on given Response object. Should always return a boolean.

Parameters:
$oResponse Response The Response object as it is returned by the server.
Returns:
bool True if everything validates, false if not
Exceptions:
ValidatorException
